page.title: 03Housing in and around Darton
page.content: Around Darton there are different types of{homes}such as terraced, detached and semi detached houses, bungalows,stone cottages and farm houses.The terraced houses were built for the families of local miners.These houses only have small gardens but there are allotments nearby which can be rented.People grow vegetables and flowers on them or some have pigeon lofts.Three of the streets of terraced houses in Darton are being improved with new paved areas and plots of trees. Kexbrough has a large council owned{ {housing estate}.The first houses were built in 1922 for rent,but some have been bought.Privately owned houses have been built in the last 20 years. {Mining subsidence}has caused damage to a lot of houses and they have had to be repaired or demolished.
